TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, in its place is an identical Dusk Vale.

I wish similar words were stabbed in the face and left to rot on top of my roof.

Granted. The words are stabbed, reading I LIKE DEER BEER. You are arrested by the deer for harboring illegal deer beer.

I wish for the power tingle.

Granted, your body constantly tingles in that way it does when you lose circulation. You know, the really awful one? That one.

I wish I could science more so that my modular base could have more parts.

Granted. The moon base you built has a bucket of science, which promptly evapourates and escapes into the sun.

Darn that Kerbol.

BEES!

I wish my illness would go away.

Your mom/dad/uncle/aunt/dog/cat/parakeet takes you to the hospital and you get cured, but the bill is so expensive they have to sell everything you have, including your very computer with your beloved KSP, to pay it.

I wish, desire and ultimately want to fly safe.

Granted. After flying for 2000+ hours nonstop, you go insane and starve.

I wish Don't Starve was less popular.

Granted. However, Starve is more popular. It's a game which forces you to sit there and stare at the screen, which water gushes out of, until you starve.

I wish for the big bada bees.

Granted. Strong bad, mysterious descendant of the Bee King of Strong Badia, accidentally pulls a tin cap out of the ground. King bee and King Bee #2 comes out of the ancient cavern, and are actually poorly animated and look like Trogdor. Disappointed, you destroy the only 2 existing big bada bees.

I wish Forum Games got replaced by "Meta Games".

Granted. They're all just links to Homestar Runner.

I wish that Homestar Runner was still active.

Granted. He runs off with his activeness. (If he's active, he's fit!)

I WISH FOR THE GLOW CLOUD TO BECOME SIGNIFICANTLY INFERIOR TO THE KRAKENS!

Granted. The Krakens are now the glow cloud. ALL HAIL THE GLOW KRAKENS.

I wish for panhckaces.
Granted, but there's no such thing as panhckaces so you don't get them.

ERROR 404: WISH NOT FOUND

I wish I had no infractions.

granted, but from this point forward will receive summary judgement and punishment up to and including vaporization.

I wish I had an element named after me.

You have it. It's in the Biblical Periodic Table, just between Exodus and Leviticus, its called Lawnicius and references to one of those apocryphal testaments.

I wish British's Nacional Anthem would be replaced by the Monty Python's musical theme.

Edited April 28, 2014 by BadLeo

Granted, but now Spam is mandatory for every meal.

I wish my car had hypergolic thrusters for easier parallel parking.

Granted, but you use a toxic fuel and it kills everyone in a 1km radius

I wish my days were a little more irregular so I don't feel like a robot in school

Granted. Now your classes don't have fixed schedule and you only get to know about one minute before they start, which causes you severe stress.

I wish free donuts for all.

Granted, but since Krispy Kreme do this in 'Murica on a certain day (don't know if it's "doughnut day" or "Krispy Kreme day"), which results in massive copyright infringement claims on a global scale. Countries are plunged even further into bankruptcy and taxes skyrocket as a result, leaving even the most affluent in poverty.

I wish work was less stressful. That would solve some of the world's problems.

Granted. All "work" is now getting eaten by a demon monster from the other side of the galaxy.

I wish the demon monster from the other side of the galaxy didn't get conjured by me to corrupt his wish.

Granted, but the kraken does it instead and gravity breaks, among other things

I wish I could control the kraken

Granted. However, you are the kraken's brain. The Kerbals spear you and leave you to die on Bop.

I wish for water.

Granted. You have half a litre of deuterium water. Of course, the government come and takes it from you.

I wish I could have radioactive super-powers.

Edited April 29, 2014 by BadLeo

Granted. You are not immune to radiation effects, and slowly die.

I wish for a Spore-themed KSP expansion pack .
